title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 41.4 - Waivers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 41.4 - Waivers

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Health may waive any provision of the Public Health Law and regulations promulgated pursuant thereto in order to implement school health projects under this Part. Any such waivers shall only be effective for the duration of the grant contract entered into under this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
41.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
